Get a callback!

During lockdown when stepping out of home was a dreaded thought, there were warriors out in the field risking their lives just to ensure our daily needs are met. They were working tirelessly day & night to serve society and to maintain peace amidst the chaos created. Never once did they failed to bring a smile on our face by doing such deeds.

We @Clove, salute you, frontline warriors!

As a mark of respect for the amazing and selfless deeds, we extend a small gesture of Rs. 1000 Oral Health Credit to you & your family who stood by your side being the major moral support.

The Oral Health Credit can be availed on any dental treatment at any Clove Clinic across the nation. All you have to do is ring us on 1800 1200 03232 and fix an appointment with our specialist and get your teeth fixed.

The details are as follows:

  • Valid for all the frontline workers (Doctors, Nurses, Paramedic Staff, Armed Forces, Police & Traffic Police, Media Personnel, Bankers, Airline Staff, Grocers, Home Delivery Agents, and others in essential services like Pharmacies, Milk Booths.) and their immediate family members
  • Valid for 2 months i.e. till 31st Aug 2020

Terms & Conditions:

  • ID Cards & Proof of relationship for family members to be presented
    *In case of family members only immediate family i.e. spouse, kids, & both sets of parents will be eligible & relationship would need to be established with relevant documents
  • The privilege value to be redeemed in a single visit & it cannot be carried forward – in one invoice
  • Clove Dental’s safety protocols & patient care policies will be applicable
  • The value is applicable on PRM Prices for all the treatments & no two offers can be clubbed
  • Offer can be availed once per person in a month (July & August 2020)
  • Multiple family members per person can avail the offer

While you were spreading smiles, we are here to protect yours.
